Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.characterCards

Class FactoryCharacterCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.characterCards.FactoryCharacterCard
public class FactoryCharacterCard extends Object
use this class to create one CharacterCard with static method getCharacterCard, with listCardsGot param you can create a random card without create two identical cards. this class has a numCharacterCards field with the amount of cards that can be created

    • getCharacterCard

      public static CharacterCard getCharacterCard(List<CharacterCard> listCardsGot, ParameterHandler parameters, AdvancedParameterHandler advancedParameters)
      choose a random card to create and check if this one already exists in listCardsGot, if yes create another one if no return the card
      Parameters:
      listCardsGot - != null
      parameters - != null
      advancedParameters - != null
      Returns:
      one random CharacterCard that is not contained in listCardsGot

    • getSpecificCard

      Parameters:
      id - > 0
      parameters - != null
      advancedParameters - != null
      Returns:
      CharacterCard with chosen id

    • getInitialEffectCards

      public static List<CharacterCard> getInitialEffectCards(ParameterHandler parameters, AdvancedParameterHandler advancedParameterHandler)
      Get CharacterCards with InitialEffect as mother class. Those cards that have students on themselves
      Returns:
      list of CharacterCard with Initial effect
